articles.title: Tips for navigating big crowds, traffic and other potential mishaps during April’s total solar eclipse - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: Small towns and rural enclaves along the path of the upcoming total solar eclipse are steeling for huge crowds of sun chasers who plan to catch a glimpse of day turning into dusk in North America.
articles.content:
MISSION, Kan. (AP) Stock up on groceries. Print off driving directions. And be very, very patient.
